And the end result of this meeting has to be a decision on the details of this remote control, like absolute final decision, and then I'm gonna have to specify the final design in the final report.

So just from last time to recap, we said we were gonna have a snowman shaped remote control with no LCD display, no need for talk-back, it was hopefully gonna be kinetic power and battery with rubber buttons, maybe backlighting the buttons with some internal LEDs to shine through the casing, hopefully a jog-dial, and incorporating the slogan somewhere as well.
Okay so if you want to present your prototype go ahead.
